name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IG DM Bot - Instagram DM Bot & Bulk Message Sender

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IG DM Bot lets you send personalized mass DMs to followers and target users to boost your reach and engagement.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🏆 Best tool for sending mass DMs (direct messages) on Instagram—perfect for reaching out to competitor's followers, following, and anyone you want.

IG DM Bot - Your ultimate Instagram Automated Messages tool. Automatically send direct messages to your targeted audience, including new followers, likers, and specific users.

🖖 KEY FEATURES:

- Automate IG DMs: Send tailored messages to new followers, followers, following, and custom users efficiently and personally.
- Social Media Tool: A comprehensive tool designed to enhance your social media engagement by facilitating bulk messaging on Instagram.

🚗 DESCRIPTION Step by Step:

1. Enter an Instagram username, select target type, and customize your messages.
2. Click the start button to initiate the messaging.

🔎 HOW DOES IT WORK:

Utilizing Instagram's official API to send messages, ensuring a seamless experience.
- Free users can send the first 10 messages.
-  Paid users can send unlimited messages for only $9.99!

🔒 USAGE POLICY:

No password required for operation.
